Text.val: GB537 determines the application version and its version components
(major, minor, build) by reading/parsing the program name which has
a public name identical with SYS() (application name).
SYS() alone seems unsafe to get the public name of our version program
We use TRIM(SYS()) until we find the first character which is not a

Text.valUnicode: press <CTRL>H to activate debug option screen
